record.dc:title: 13HY1 Williams Site 1HY1, Henry County, Tennessee. Feature 20, Photograph showing posts and trenches partially excavated. Groups of "directly superimposed" structures showing open corner wall trenches. No floor levels or fire basins were found. Sq. 16R5. Direction north.
record.wpa:narrative: This situation was very complicated, many of the trenches crossing each other, others running into single channels. Only evidence for chronological order lies in relative depth of trenches and in determination of precedence through markings showing in the fills. Average postmold diameter ca. 0.3'. Average interstices ca. 0.5'. Interstices not uniform.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has additional information in regards to the dimensions and boundaries of Features 20A-D.
record.wpa:photograph_category: People Lab and Field Scenes; Structure Patterns
